sqlMap.update:
update prod_offer set STATUS_DATE=SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0
OFFER_TYPE=#offerType# PROD_OFFER_NAME=#prodOfferName# INNER_OFFER_NAME=#innerOfferName# PROD_OFFER_PUBLISHER=#prodOfferPublisher# STATUS_CD=#statusCd# EFF_DATE=#effDate# EXP_DATE=#expDate# OFFER_NBR=#offerNbr# OFFER_PROVIDER_ID=#offerProviderId# BRAND_ID=#brandId# SERV_BRAND_ID=#servBrandId# TEMPLET_ID=#templetId# DEFAULT_TIME_PERIOD=#defaultTimePeriod# PROD_OFFER_DESC=#prodOfferDesc# EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID=#extProdOfferId# EXP_PROC_METHOD=#expProcMethod# VALUE_ADDED_FLAG=#valueAddedFlag# MANAGE_GRADE=#manageGrade# PROD_OFFER_INITIALAMOUNT=#prodOfferInitialamount# EXPIRE_HANDLE_CONDITION=#expireHandleCondition# COMMON_REGION_ID=#commonRegionId# MANAGE_GRADE2=#manageGrade2# CREATE_DT=#createDt# SIMPLE_SPELL=#simpleSpell# VERSION=#version# INNER_OFFER_NBR=#innerOfferNbr# PROD_OFFER_TRAIT=#prodOfferTrait# COOPERATION_TYPE=#cooperationType# LOGO_FILE_ID=#logoFileId# AUDIT_FLOW_ID=#auditFlowId# TENANT_ID=#tenantId# OPERATE_CODE=#operateCode#
PROD_OFFER_ID=#prodOfferId# TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_PROD_OFFER.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into PROD_OFFER (STATUS_DATE,CREATE_DT,VERSION
PROD_OFFER_ID OFFER_TYPE PROD_OFFER_NAME INNER_OFFER_NAME
PROD_OFFER_PUBLISHER STATUS_CD EFF_DATE EXP_DATE OFFER_NBR OFFER_PROVIDER_ID BRAND_ID SERV_BRAND_ID TEMPLET_ID DEFAULT_TIME_PERIOD PROD_OFFER_DESC EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID EXP_PROC_METHOD VALUE_ADDED_FLAG MANAGE_GRADE PROD_OFFER_INITIALAMOUNT EXPIRE_HANDLE_CONDITION COMMON_REGION_ID MANAGE_GRADE2
SIMPLE_SPELL
INNER_OFFER_NBR PROD_OFFER_TRAIT COOPERATION_TYPE LOGO_FILE_ID TENANT_ID OPERATE_CODE
) values (SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0,SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0,SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0
#prodOfferId# #offerType# #prodOfferName# #innerOfferName#
#prodOfferPublisher# #statusCd# #effDate# #expDate# #offerNbr# #offerProviderId# #brandId# #servBrandId# #templetId# #defaultTimePeriod# #prodOfferDesc# #extProdOfferId# #expProcMethod# #valueAddedFlag# #manageGrade# #prodOfferInitialamount# #expireHandleCondition# #commonRegionId# #manageGrade2#
#simpleSpell#
#innerOfferNbr# #prodOfferTrait# #cooperationType# #logoFileId# #tenantId# #operateCode#
)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.PROD_OFFER_ID prodOfferId,A.OFFER_TYPE offerType,A.PROD_OFFER_NAME prodOfferName,A.INNER_OFFER_NAME innerOfferName, A.STATUS_DATE statusDate,A.PROD_OFFER_PUBLISHER prodOfferPublisher,A.STATUS_CD statusCd,A.EFF_DATE effDate,A.EXP_DATE expDate, A.OFFER_NBR offerNbr,A.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID offerProviderId,A.BRAND_ID brandId,A.SERV_BRAND_ID servBrandId,A.TEMPLET_ID templetId, A.DEFAULT_TIME_PERIOD defaultTimePeriod,A.PROD_OFFER_DESC prodOfferDesc,A.EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID extProdOfferId,A.EXP_PROC_METHOD expProcMethod, A.VALUE_ADDED_FLAG valueAddedFlag,A.MANAGE_GRADE manageGrade,A.PROD_OFFER_INITIALAMOUNT prodOfferInitialamount,A.EXPIRE_HANDLE_CONDITION expireHandleCondition, A.COMMON_REGION_ID commonRegionId,A.MANAGE_GRADE2 manageGrade2,A.CREATE_DT createDt,A.SIMPLE_SPELL simpleSpell,A.VERSION version, A.INNER_OFFER_NBR innerOfferNbr,A.PROD_OFFER_TRAIT prodOfferTrait,A.COOPERATION_TYPE cooperationType ,A.LOGO_FILE_ID logoFileId ,A.AUDIT_FLOW_ID auditFlowId, A.tenant_id tenantId,A.OPERATE_CODE operateCode FROM PROD_OFFER A
PROD_OFFER_ID=#prodOfferId# OFFER_TYPE=#offerType#
PROD_OFFER_NAME=#prodOfferName#
INNER_OFFER_NAME=#innerOfferName# STATUS_DATE=#statusDate# STATUS_CD!=#statusCd# EFF_DATE=#effDate#
PROD_OFFER_PUBLISHER=#prodOfferPublisher# EXP_DATE=#expDate#
OFFER_PROVIDER_ID=#offerProviderId# OFFER_NBR=#offerNbr# BRAND_ID=#brandId#
SERV_BRAND_ID=#servBrandId# TEMPLET_ID=#templetId#
DEFAULT_TIME_PERIOD=#defaultTimePeriod#
PROD_OFFER_DESC=#prodOfferDesc#
EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID=#extProdOfferId#
EXP_PROC_METHOD=#expProcMethod#
VALUE_ADDED_FLAG=#valueAddedFlag#
MANAGE_GRADE=#manageGrade#
PROD_OFFER_INITIALAMOUNT=#prodOfferInitialamount#
EXPIRE_HANDLE_CONDITION=#expireHandleCondition#
COMMON_REGION_ID=#commonRegionId#
MANAGE_GRADE2=#manageGrade2# CREATE_DT=#createDt# VERSION=#version#
SIMPLE_SPELL=#simpleSpell#
INNER_OFFER_NBR=#innerOfferNbr#
PROD_OFFER_TRAIT=#prodOfferTrait#
COOPERATION_TYPE=#cooperationType# TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

select b.* from (select rownum RECNO,a.* from (
select t.*,org.name name from PROD_OFFER t, org org where t.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID = org.org_id and t.STATUS_CD != '1300' AND t.STATUS_CD != '1600'
t.prod_offer_name like '%'||#offerName#||'%' t.EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID like '%'||#offerCode#||'%' t.tenant_id=#tenantId#
t.COOPERATION_TYPE = '10' t.COOPERATION_TYPE = '11'
t.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID IN
#providerId[]#
t.COOPERATION_TYPE = '10' t.COOPERATION_TYPE = '11' and t.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID = #providerId# (t.COOPERATION_TYPE = '10' or t.COOPERATION_TYPE = '11' and t.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID = #providerId#)
t.PROD_OFFER_ID NOT IN
#extVal[]#
and t.cooperation_type!='13' ORDER BY t.PROD_OFFER_ID DESC ) a where ROWNUM <= (#pro_mysql# + #page_record# ) ORDER BY ROWNUM ) b where RECNO BETWEEN (#pro_mysql#+1) AND (#pro_mysql# + #page_record# )

select count(1) from PROD_OFFER t, org org where t.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID = org.org_id and t.STATUS_CD != '1300' AND t.STATUS_CD != '1600'
t.prod_offer_name like '%'||#offerName#||'%' t.EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID like '%'||#offerCode#||'%' t.tenant_id=#tenantId#
t.COOPERATION_TYPE = '10' t.COOPERATION_TYPE = '11'
t.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID IN
#providerId[]#
t.COOPERATION_TYPE = '10' t.COOPERATION_TYPE = '11' and t.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID = #providerId# (t.COOPERATION_TYPE = '10' or t.COOPERATION_TYPE = '11' and t.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID = #providerId#)
t.PROD_OFFER_ID NOT IN
#extVal[]#
and t.cooperation_type!='13'
select count(1) from prod_offer a where a.EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID=#extProdOfferId# and STATUS_CD!=1300 and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
select count(*) from prod_offer where ext_prod_offer_id=#extProdOfferId# and offer_provider_id=#offerProviderId# and status_cd!=1300 and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
select count(BUSI_ID) from settle_sp_busi_def where busi_code=#busiCode# and serv_code=#servCode# and tenant_id=#tenantId#

select count(*) from offer_prod_rel_pricing oprp where oprp.offer_prod_rela_id in ( select opr.offer_prod_rela_id from offer_prod_rel opr where opr.prod_offer_id=#prodOfferId# and opr.product_id=#productId# and opr.tenant_id=#tenantId#)
